name: Macrosynergy Partners LLP
goal: Macrosynergy Partners LLP are a London based alternative asset manager. They manage capital with a variable bias global macro discretionary strategy, investing in foreign exchange, rates, credit and equity.
interests: Budget, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Taxation
euInitiatives: In relation to our professional activities, we follow EU policies  We are interested in learning how policymaking will impact economic conditions in the economies which we invest.
